entry.title: Notes for Blog Writing by Hexo and NexT
entry.content: Create a article hexo new “title” Write a article based on MarkdownTitle syntax： 12345678# first title## second title### third title#### fourth title##### fifth title###### sixth titleNotes：# + space + title name effects： Font form syntax： 1234*italic***bold*****italic bold***~~strikethrough~~ effects：italicbolditalic boldstrikethrough Website links syntax： 12[my blog](http://taotaobao.github.io)<https://taotaobao.github.io> effect：my bloghttps://taotaobao.github.io Quotation syntax： 123> words or sentences quotedNotes：> + space + words or sentences quoted effect： words or sentences quoted Codes syntax： 123456`codes in a single line`aaacodes in multi-linescodes in multi-linesaaa（Notes：a = `） effects： codes in a single line 12codes in multi-linescodes in multi-lines separation line syntax： 12---*** effects： Lists unordered lists： syntax： 123* listed items- listed items+ listed items effects： listed items listed items listed items ordered lists syntax： 1231. red2. green3. blue effects： red green blue Tables syntax： 1234|on the left|on the right|in the middle||:-----|------:|:----:||content11|content12|content13||content21|content22|content23| effect： on the left on the right in the middle content11 content12 content13 content21 content22 content23 Notes： 表格的语句上一行必须为空行，不然表格不生效。 |、-、:之间的多余空格会被忽略，不影响布局。 默认标题栏居中对齐，内容居左对齐。 -:表示内容和标题栏居右对齐，:-表示内容和标题栏居左对齐，:-:表示内容和标题栏居中对齐。 内容和|之间的多余空格会被忽略，每行第一个|和最后一个|可以省略，-的数量至少有一个。 Pictures syntax： 1![](/Notes-for-hexo-writing/avatar.png) effects Notes：一般图片放在和hexo new “title”一起生成的同名的文件夹中，调用时候直接用title/picturename.png即可 How to control the position and size? entry.title: Hello, World!
entry.content: Welcome to TaoTaoBao’s Blog Every blog starts with ‘Hello World!’, so do mine. I am TaoTaoBao, the maker of this Blog. My Blog contains my occational thoughts and records my life, including normal life and research career with happiness and sorrow). Also, TaoTaoBao’s Blog is the place where I write articles about CFA learning and Fintech. I’d like to study finance and economics in both fundamental and technical ways. I plan to include the prospectus study, which is, I think, the best way to understand the industry. Last but not least, I will blog my English learning details, which I hope can motivate me to learn English better everyday, and my reading about tranditional cultures materials (history, philosophy and literature), which can help me improve my EQ and find my dream.
